title: Workplace understanding prevents caregiver discrimination
content:
Scenario: Workplace understanding prevents caregiver discrimination
    Given caregivers often face employment discrimination
    And James might be seen as less committed or reliable
    When the workplace_elohim monitors for discrimination
    Then it should recognize caregiver discrimination patterns
    And it should educate employers about caregiver rights
    And it should advocate when James faces unfair treatment
    And workplace should not penalize caregiving responsibilities
    And caregiver status should be protected like other statuses
